segments.text: This facility is great , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is better than last year . They have done a very good job this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad our booth is on the first floor . More people can see our display .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If someone wants to find us , they can look at this floor plan.It shows where all the companies have their booths .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see that . I didn't get one when I came in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? They didn't give you one with your ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's strange .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you go for lunch around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you hungry ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too bad . But I will be soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went across the street . There is a good Chinese restaurant next to the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't see Cortex on this floor plan . Don't they have a booth here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They must . Let me look at that.Here it is . Cortex . It's on the second floor , next to the Roll booth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that will be uncomfortable for them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For whom ? Cortex ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Cortex just stole Darren McDowell from Rolly.And probably Darren will be here.So he will have to spend the whole show standing next to his old Cortex coworkers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never met Darren.But you're right . That would probably be uncomfortable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you reserve a booth , you should check who your neighbors will be.Don ' t you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , maybe . If you're Darren McDowell , you should probably check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Well , I think I'll go get lunch . Will you join me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'll stay here at the booth . I ate earlier . Are you going to the Chinese restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . I will look around .
segments.speaker: S1
